name: Ruiga Pirates: First Survivors
description:
Ruiga Pirates: First Survivors is a survivors-like game. Hellish seas, pirates everywhere and you can't escape sea creatures. All you can do is fight to the death and take what you can and leave nothing behind. Collect gold on every run to buy upgrades, new ships and find skilled captains. Get ready for seven seas challenges!



In the prologue of our game, players are thrust into a world of high seas piracy, where the haunting specter of ghosts looms large. Amidst constant battles for survival, they must navigate treacherous waters, facing both natural and supernatural threats. With adrenaline-pumping action and thrilling encounters, the prologue sets the stage for an epic adventure filled with excitement and peril.



Choose your ship and captain. Customize your enhancements. Your choices will make you live more and make you shoot more. Prevent enemy ships from approaching you. Avoid fires and watch out for traps. Complete challenges and explore hidden treasures.



With the missions you will take, you will sometimes bomb an island and sometimes go after the most wanted pirates. Get ready for legends of krakens, mermaids and more!
